thing-type.label: SCN01 One-key Scene Controller
thing-type.description: One-key Scene Controller<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtThe Scene Controller is a slave product that is wireless, portable and rechargeable. It can control a Z-Wave device, such as smart plug, smart dimmer through a Z-Wave gateway. You can also activate a scene like sleep scene, movie scene and entertainment scene with it.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<h3&gtInclude as a non-secure device</h3&gt <ol&gt<li&gtSet the Z-Wave controller into include mode.</li&gt <li&gtTriple click the Z-button.</li&gt <li&gtIf the inclusion is successful, the LED will blink blue for 5 seconds and then remain solid for 15 seconds.</li&gt </ol&gt<h3&gtInclude as a secure device</h3&gt <ol&gt<li&gtSet the Z-Wave controller into include mode.</li&gt <li&gtPress and hold the Z-button for 3 seconds.</li&gt <li&gtIf the inclusion is successful, the LED will blink green for 5 seconds and then remain solid for 15 seconds.</li&gt </ol&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<ol&gt<li&gtSet the Z-Wave controller into exclude mode.</li&gt <li&gtTriple click the Z-button.</li&gt <li&gtIf the exclusion is successful, the LED will blink orange for 5 seconds and then remain solid for 3 seconds.</li&gt </ol&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtWakeup Information</h2&gt<p&gtThere are no available settings to set up the wake up time.Â </p&gt <p&gtPress and hold the Z-Button for 3 seconds. The led will turn to green, which means the scene controller has successfully sent the wake up notification out.</p&gt
